member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddNewerRastersParameters
member.summary: Provides access to members that control parameters for adding newer rasters to a mosaic dataset.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddNewerRastersParameters.OverwriteExisting
member.summary: Indicates whether existing mosaic dataset items are updated with datasets that have been modified on disk. When set to false, the operation skips over modified data source items that already exist in the mosaic dataset.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters
member.summary: Provides access to members that control parameters for adding rasters to a mosaic dataset.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters.AllowInPlaceSync
member.summary: Inidicates whether to allow items to be build as soon as they are added to the mosaic dataset (as long as the raster type allows in-place synchronization).

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters.Crawler
member.summary: The data source crawler that provides incoming data source items.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters.DuplicateItemsAction
member.summary: Indicates how incoming duplicates items are handled. Item URIs with the same key value are assumed to be duplicate.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters.Filter
member.summary: Regular expression formed using wild card characters ('*', '?', or '.') for matching data source items created by the crawler. No item URIs are requested for those data sources don't match the specified regular expression.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters.RasterType
member.summary: The raster type used for constructing raster datasets using incoming data source items.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters.SynchronizeItems
member.summary: Indicates whether catalog items are synchronized once added to the mosaic dataset.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAddRastersParameters.TimeExtent
member.summary: The range of allowed time value for Item URIs. Item URIs with 'SourceTimeStamp' that don't lie within the specified range are filtered out.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAdjustXform
member.summary: Provides access to members that control an adjustment (rubber sheeting) transform.

member.summary: Defines an adjustement transform using control points.

member.summary: Gets control points.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAdjustXform.NaturalNeighbor
member.summary: Indicates if natural neighbor interpolation should be used.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.DataSourcesRaster.IAdjustXform.PolynomialApproximation
member.summary: The polynomial for initial approximation.

member.summary: Indicates whether the geometry associated with each selected mosaic dataset item is analyzed.

member.summary: Indicates whether raster key properties associated with selected mosaic dataset items are analyzed.

member.summary: Indicates whether performance of selected mosaic dataset item and of the mosaic dataset as a whole is analyzed.

member.summary: Indicates whether raster pyramids associated with selected mosaic dataset items are analyzed.

member.summary: Indicates whether selected mosaic dataset item are analyzed for being stale.

member.summary: Indicates whether raster statistics associated with selected mosaic dataset items are analyzed.

member.summary: Indicates whether the visibility of each selected mosaic dataset item is analyzed.

member.summary: Indicates whether the error and status tables are cleared prior to the analysis.
